Name: Panotti
Melee: short sword +4 (1d6+2/19-20) or   2 wings +2 (1d4+1 plus push, 10 ft.)
AbilitiyScores: Str 15, Dex 13, Con 14, Int 10, Wis 12, Cha 11
SpecialAbilities: Elephantine Ears (Ex) A panotti can flap its huge ears to fly awkwardly. A panotti can also wrap its ears around the length of its body for warmth and protection from the elements (similar to using a bedroll or heavy blankets), or use them as secondary natural attacks (as per wing attacks).
